events.name: TST Sober Faction: Sobriety Without Superstition
events.description: TST Sober Faction will close on May 2 hosting a full open meeting where guests can participate in as well.

events.name: Conspiracism and the Moral Cause
events.description: Join Lucien Greaves for his lecture on how conspiracy theorists hijack victim's rights movements.

events.name: An Atheist Enrolls in Bob Larson's International School of Exorcism
events.description: Ross Blocher, co-host of the investigations podcast Oh No, Ross and Carrie, shares findings from his and Carrie's longest-running investigation. See what it's like to attend Satanic panic proponent Bob Larson's live exorcisms, enroll in his International School of Exorcism and Advanced Academy of Deliverance, and meet up with other exorcists at a convention in Texas.

events.name: COMPASSION & EMPATHY: A Panel Discussion on Satanic Mental Health
events.description: A panel discussion moderated by Kaelea Kae featuring Shiva Honey, Adam Ostrofsky and Lilith Starr, with an introduction by Simon Widdop. Discussions of personal experiences of how we heal, self-care and connect with others to improve our mental health as Satanists.

events.name: Satanic Art Social Hour
events.description: Hexennacht is a heavy Holiday for Satanists. Come unwind with Zoey Inferni for an hour of Satanic art! Bring whatever medium you prefer - crafts, painting, doodling, clay, etc. We will share on webcam while we chat.

events.name: Bats in the Belfry!
events.description: Livestreaming your new best friends, bats from BatWorld. Donate at batworld.org

events.name: A Happy Hooven Home: Goats!
events.description: Livestream of goats. Sponsor one of these good kids at woodstocksanctuary.org

events.name: Whimsical Blasphemy
events.description: Join Mercy for music and videos all night, live from Salem.

events.name: Grey Faction Satanic Archives
events.description: TSTVHQ's Satanic Archive Library is open all night. Texts courtesy of Center for Inquiry and Grey Faction.
